languages.text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, до потери {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} получает +<u>число уровней временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} на 1 раунд.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the Vanguard's turn, before their temporary wounds are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>(number of temporary wounds)</u> Strength for 1 round.
At the start of the Vanguard's turn, before their temporary wounds are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary wounds</u> Strength for 1 round.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, до потери {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} получает +<u>число уровней временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: В начале своего хода, до потери временного здоровья, авангард получает +<u>число уровней временного здоровья</u> к Силе на 1 раунд.
В начале своего хода, до потери временного здоровья, авангард получает +<u>число уровней временного здоровья</u> к Силе на 1 раунд.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，在{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}流失之前，先锋每有1点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，就会获得<u>1点{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}</u>，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 先锋的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，在{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}流失之前，先锋每有1点临时生命值，就会获得<u>1点{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}</u>，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，在{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}流失之前，先锋每有1点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，就会获得<u>1点{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}</u>，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g}, antes de perder sus {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, el vanguardia gana +<u>número de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia, antes de perder sus {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, el vanguardia gana +<u>número de heridas temporales</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} erhält sie, bevor ihre {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} verloren gehen, 1 Runde lang +<u>Anzahl der temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} der Vorhut erhält sie, bevor ihre {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} verloren gehen, +<u>Anzahl der temporären Wunden</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g}, avant la perte de ses {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Patrouilleur, avant la perte de ses {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>nombre de blessures temporaires</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が失われる前、ヴァンガードは1ラウンドの間、+<u>一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の量</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が失われる前、ヴァンガードは1ラウンドの間、+<u>一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の量</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}を得る。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が失われる前、ヴァンガードは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+<u>一時体力の量</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}; {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanlarını yitirmeden önce +<u>geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı sayısı</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, 1 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, before their {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} are lost, the Vanguard gains +<u>number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for 1 round.
